explanation: Analysis of the live chat reveals a dominant bullish sentiment for BTC. Multiple users discuss expectations of BTC reaching new all-time highs (ATH), with specific targets of 109k-111k and even calls that BTC will never go below 100k again. There is significant talk about squeezing shorts, fakeouts, and pumps, suggesting active buying interest and bullish trading setups. Despite some negative mentions regarding hashrate fears and short-term volatility, the majority of actionable opinions are bullish, with recommendations to buy or long BTC, signals for spot buying, and questions about optimal entry for buying. Leverage queries and suggestions are common, and the environment is risk-on, with participants seeking high potential upside. Overall, the buy signal is reinforced by both market sentiment and technical discussion.
